show_name: Detective Conan: A Challenge from Agasa (OAV)
other_title: Meitantei Conan: Agasa kara no Chōsenjō! Agasa vs. Conan & Shōnen Tanteidan (Japanese)
名探偵コナン 阿笠からの挑戦状！ 阿笠 VS コナン&少年探偵団 (Japanese)
plot: While creating a elaborate goose chase for the detective boys Professer Agasa becomes ensnared in a ransom plot and is abducted. It's up to Conan to deduce his location.
